SEARCH
Package Boundary

Class StudentCLI

java.lang.Object
Boundary.AbstractCLI
Boundary.StudentCLI
public class StudentCLI extends AbstractCLI
Boundary class for student user interface. Provides functionality for students to view internships (filtered by their major), apply for opportunities, check application status, accept/reject offers, and request withdrawals. Students can apply to maximum 3 internships at once and can accept only 1 internship placement.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allen
